      • addOrgs

        public void addOrgs(StateBasedEndorsement.RoleType role,
                    java.lang.String... organizations)
        Description copied from interface: StateBasedEndorsement
        Adds the specified orgs to the list of orgs that are required to endorse. All orgs MSP role types will be set to the role that is specified in the first parameter. Among other aspects the desired role depends on the channel's configuration: if it supports node OUs, it is likely going to be the PEER role, while the MEMBER role is the suited one if it does not.
        Specified by:
        addOrgs in interface StateBasedEndorsement

      • delOrgs

        public void delOrgs(java.lang.String... organizations)
        Description copied from interface: StateBasedEndorsement
        deletes the specified channel orgs from the existing key-level endorsement policy for this KVS key.
        Specified by:
        delOrgs in interface StateBasedEndorsement
